GUI.admin

Class AddUser

  • java.lang.Object
    • GUI.admin.AddUser

  • public class AddUser
extends java.lang.Object
    Class made to handle GUI associated with adding a new user into the system.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private javax.swing.JPanel addUser
      The panel that everything is inside except from the rootpanel/mainpanel.
      private javax.swing.JButton addUserButton1
      JButton that the Admin presses when he/she have inserted all the info he/she needs to add a new user.
      private javax.swing.JRadioButton adminRadioButton 
      private javax.swing.JRadioButton bloodAnalyst
      JRadioButton that the Admin selects if he/she wants the new user to be a blood analyst.
      private javax.swing.JRadioButton bloodCollectingOfficer
      JRadioButton that the Admin selects if he/she wants the new user to be a blood collecting officer.
      private javax.swing.JTextField firstname
      JTextField where the Admin writes the first name of the user he/she wants to add.
      private javax.swing.JTextField lastname
      JTextField where the Admin writes the last name of the user he/she wants to add.
      private javax.swing.JTextField password
      JTextField where the Admin writes the password of the user he/she wants to add.
      private javax.swing.JPanel rootPanel
      The rootPanel (mainPanel) that you add in other JFrames to show the AddUser Panel.
      private javax.swing.JTextField telephone
      JTextField where the Admin writes the telephone number of the user he/she wants to add.
      private javax.swing.JTextField username
      JTextField where the Admin writes the username of the user he/she wants to add.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AddUser

        public AddUser()
        Method takes input from the Admin (firstname, lastname, telephone, username and password) that is needed to add a user to the database. When the add user button is pressed, a confirm dialog will pop up asking if the information is correct. If the Admin confirms, a user object will be created. It will add the user to the User table in the database as well as the table for blood collecting officers or doping analysts. The username must available because username is primary key.

    • Method Detail

      • getMainPanel

        public javax.swing.JPanel getMainPanel()
        Method returns the rootPanel so the AddUser window will be shown after pressing the Add user button in other windows in the program.
        Returns:
        JPanel
